name: landscan_global_population
title: LandScan Population Count
description: Estimated population count from LandScan. Underlying dataset provides number of people per 1km pixel, based on an ambient population (average over 24 hours) distribution.
details: No additional processing of raw data.

extract_types_info.sum: total population per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Please visit https://landscan.ornl.gov/node/183 for detailed citations when using LandScan data.
